name: To Hive & to Hold
description:
Mikki lives in a world where the Bluue Corps implant has changed society forever. Individuals can connect their minds to others wirelessly and have created a hivemind political system where various hives live together and choose their king, queen or monarch to represent them at the congress. 

Mikki's hive is in trouble and they decide that the best way forward for them is to form a strong alliance with another hive by marriage.

Will Mikki find love and can she lead her hive out of trouble? It's up to you!

Mikki

Sweet and flighty, Mikki is the type to change her mind from moment to moment with new information and her mood. Probably not the best character trait in a leader but then again, flexibility could be a strength!

Loy

Loy is your typical know-it-all guy, full of witty comebacks and advice, not so good with the emotional intelligence. Will that be enough to win Mikki over?

Titch

Titch is a vocal 'Luddite' as they are called, the rebels against the hive system who refuse to be chipped. Will you join forces with him and fight back against the hive system?

Nea

Nea is the gentle but fair leader of the Marrow hive, where people and Earth care are paramount. She might be quite a suitable match! But does she get your heart beating?

Demo created by Galactic Gradient 22 for NaNoRenO 2022.
